summary: Website for quotes from non-famous people.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal typographic logo mark with a quote motif, warm neutral palette (quotes-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Subtle paper grain / texture background, seamless or large canvas (paper-texture.dim_1600x900.png)

existing_features.title: Create a frontend that showcases quotes from non-famous people with a home feed and a quote submission form.
Add basic browsing utilities to help users discover quotes, including search by text/author and simple sorting.
Apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme across the site (colors, typography, spacing, and components) suitable for a quotes-focused reading experience, avoiding blue/purple as the primary palette.
Add static generated image assets for branding and ambiance and render them in the UI (stored under frontend/public/assets/generated).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a website that showcases quotes from non-famous people.
Implement backend data model and APIs to store and retrieve quotes from non-famous people, including creating a quote and listing quotes.
